# readme-generator

## Overview
This is a sample README generated by the script.

## Folder Structure
```
┣━ 📁 .github
┃  ┗━ 📁 workflows
┃     ┗━ ⚙️ python-publish.yml
┣━ 📁 readme_generator
┃  ┣━ 🐍 __init__.py
┃  ┣━ 🐍 emoji_map.py
┃  ┣━ 🐍 generate_readme.py
┃  ┣━ 🐍 readme_builder.py
┃  ┗━ 🐍 repo_structure.py
┣━ 📄 .gitignore
┣━ 📄 pyproject.toml
┣━ 📝 README.md
┗━ 📃 requirements.txt
```

## Files Description
* 📁 `.github`:
	- 📁 `workflows`:
		- ⚙️ `python-publish.yml`:
* 📁 `readme_generator`:
	- 🐍 `__init__.py`:
	- 🐍 `emoji_map.py`:
	- 🐍 `generate_readme.py`:
	- 🐍 `readme_builder.py`:
	- 🐍 `repo_structure.py`:
* 📄 `.gitignore`:
* 📄 `pyproject.toml`:
* 📝 `README.md`:
* 📃 `requirements.txt`:
